challenge.title: RSA Challenge I: Bad Primes
challenge.author: Subhayan RoyMoulick, Dan Myshkin, Spyros Gasteratos
challenge.description: We have an RSA encrypted message. All we know is that the program that generated the RSA primes, p,q uses a bad PRG, so we are confindent |p-q| leq 10000 (decimal). Your Objective : Factor N, and tell us the originial messeage.
